mapper.sql: SELECT A.GUID, A.CREATETIME, A.CREATEUSERGUID, A.UPDATETIME, A.UPDATEUSERGUID, A.REVISETYPE, A.REVISEVALUE
mapper.select:
FROM bi_config_rule_revise a
and a.guid=#GUID# and a.createtime=#CREATETIME# and a.createuserguid=#CREATEUSERGUID# and a.updatetime=#UPDATETIME# and a.updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# and a.REVISETYPE=#REVISETYPE# and a.REVISEVALUE=#REVISEVALUE#
ORDER BY a.UPDATETIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bi_config_rule_revise ( guid, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid, REVISETYPE, REVISEVALUE ) values (#GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #REVISETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #REVISEVALUE:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE bi_config_rule_revise
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, REVISETYPE=#REVISETYPE#, REVISEVALUE=#REVISEVALUE#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
